humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the invasive component of the tumor has a maximum gross dimension of 4 cm. Based on the rules provided, a T2 tumor is more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the predicted T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the invasive component of the tumor has a maximum gross dimension of 4 cm. According to the TNM staging system for cancer, a T2 stage is defined as a tumor that is 2-5 cm in size. Therefore, the T stage for this patient is T2.
